meanings.definition: The act of erecting or the state of being erected.
meanings.sent1: The erections of the new building were completed in record time.
meanings.sent2: The workers were proud of the sturdy erections they had built.
meanings.sent3: The erections of the tent made for a cozy camping experience.
meanings.sent4: The erections of the skyscrapers reached towards the sky like giants awakening.
meanings.sent5: The wooden erections of the fence stood strong against the wind.

meanings.sent1: The ancient ruins revealed the erections of a once magnificent palace.
meanings.sent2: The erections of the bridge spanned the river elegantly.
meanings.sent3: The children built small erections with their toy blocks.
meanings.sent4: The stone erections of the castle seemed to whisper tales of the past.
meanings.sent5: The metal erections of the sculpture gleamed in the sunlight.

meanings.sent1: The sudden erections of the flag caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent2: The erections of the flowers signaled the arrival of spring.
meanings.sent3: The erections of the hair on the cat's back made it look bigger than it was.
meanings.sent4: The erections of the sails filled with wind, propelling the boat forward.
meanings.sent5: The erections of the balloons brought color to the dull room.
